name: Razor
title: The Wolf Boy
description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

normalattack.name: Steel Fang
normalattack.description: Performs up to four consecutive strikes. When charged, performs continuous swirling attacks and finally deals a massive strike.

elementalskill.name: Claw and Thunder
elementalskill.description: Deals Electro DMG and gains an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate. He can have up to three Electro Sigils at a time.

elementalburst.name: Lightning Fang
elementalburst.description: Releases a Wolf that does Electro DMG to enemies while on the battlefield and raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES. Also disables Razor's Charged Attacks.

passivetalent1.name: Wolvensprint
passivetalent1.description: The party's Sprinting Stamina Consumption reduces by 20%.

passivetalent2.name: Awakening
passivetalent2.description: Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%. Additionally, Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

passivetalent3.name: Hunger
passivetalent3.description: When Razor's Energy is below 50% his Energy Recharge increases 30%.

constellations.d1: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.
constellations.d2: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG. 
 When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an enemy will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.

profile.description: Razor is a young man with long, spiky grey hair; bright red eyes; and pale skin with a scar in his left cheek. Razor has many scars, as a result of his time living in the wild with his wolf family.Razor wears green camouflage pants, an orange poncho-like shirt, dark boots, and a dark hooded coat decorated with belts. His accessories are a tooth necklace, thumbless orange gloves, and one gold earring on his left ear.

zhdescription: 住在蒙德地区奔狼领，远离城市与人群，和狼一同生活的少年。直觉锐利，身姿

zhnormalattack.name: 钢脊
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击：进行至多四段的连续挥砍。
重击：持续消耗体力旋转大剑，攻击周围的敌人。结束旋转时，会进行一次格外有力的挥斩。

zhelementalskill.name: 利爪与苍雷
zhelementalskill.description:
用师父与他的「家人」教他的方法，来解决猎物。

点按：
若命中敌人，则会为雷泽积攒一个雷之印，提高雷泽的元素充能效率。最多同时存在3个雷之印，叠加刷新持续时间

长按:
积聚雷电力量引发小范围的雷爆，造成大量雷元素伤害，并清除已有的雷之印。每个因此被清除的雷之印，都会转为雷泽的元素能量。雷击落下的一瞬，偶尔能瞥见雷泽灵魂深处那头狼打量猎物的眼神。

zhelementalburst.name: 雷牙

zhpassivetalent1.name: 觉醒
zhpassivetalent1.description: 利爪与苍雷的冷却时间降低18%.施放雷牙时，重置利爪与苍雷的冷却时间。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 饥饿
zhpassivetalent2.description: 雷泽的元素能量在50%以下时，元素充能效率提高30%。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 奔狼
zhpassivetalent3.description: 队伍中所有角色冲刺消耗的体力降低20%。同类天赋取最高效果。

zhconstellations.d1: 雷泽获取元素晶球或元素徼粒后的8秒内，造成的伤害提高10%
zhconstellations.d2: 攻击生命值低于30％的敌人时，暴击率提高10％。
zhconstellations.d3: 雷牙的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级)
zhconstellations.d4: 利爪与苍雷点按时，会使命中的敌人防御力降低15％，持续7秒
zhconstellations.d5: 利爪与苍雷的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d6: 每10秒，雷泽的大剑将自动充能，使下一次音通攻击引发落雷，造成100％攻击力的雷元素伤害。不处于雷牙状态下时，若落雷击中敌人，会为雷泽添加一层雷之印
